attributes.action: Modernise the sitting hours of the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details:
For too long the House of Commons have had a set of hours which are not in line with modern lifestyle as the MPs are there due to being voted in by the Public they should also work the same hours.

Therefore, we would recommend that the House of Commons revisits the sitting hours as well as the amount of time it takes off for recess to make it more relevant to the public and the Twenty-first century.
